title: Beach House
description: Swim.Sunbathe.Die.The sun is hot. The water's cold. And the kids are cool. Too cool to live. Because a killer is stalking them, one by one. A killer who never leaves a clue. Who disappears as completely as a footprint in the sand.A killer who has found a very special place in the sunfor some very special sun...
author: R.L. Stine
